item.description: Rumney NH climbing trip, meet at Wellington train station at 7:00 am leave by 7:15 am. For those that need a ride, and those that want to drive up ahead we’ll meet at the main parking lot. Arrive at Rumney main parking lot at 9:15 am / 9:30 am. Bring water and snacks, Bring bathing suites for a refreshing, relaxing swim in the baker river during the summer climbing trips. Basic equipment you would need to top rope and belaying, harness-shoes-atc/locking carabiner, for sport lead climbing quick draws-slings, and the knowledge of lead belaying. Now there are a few that will boulder, bring equipment that you’ll need such as CRASH PADS. climbing 5.7’s to 5.11’s, V1’s to V5’s is encourage. The July and August meet/up trips will be climb and camp weekend at Rattlesnake MTN Campground $8.00 per person, no pets allowed, extremely basic amenities, 603-786-2330, across from the main parking lot.
item.name: Climbing and Camping, Rumney NH
